courses.name: JROTC Air Force I
courses.description: Air Force JROTC's mission is to \Develop citizens of character dedicated to serving their nation and community.\ The program educates and trains cadets in citizenship

courses.name: JROTC Air Force II
courses.description: Students continue their studies in aerospace science

courses.name: JROTC Air Force III
courses.description: Advanced studies in aerospace science cover cultural and global awareness

courses.name: JROTC Air Force IV
courses.description: Students engage in advanced aerospace science topics including policy and organization. Leadership education emphasizes advanced principles of management

courses.name: JROTC Air Force Advanced
courses.description: This course provides advanced leadership opportunities and advanced skill development for students who have completed the JROTC Air Force program. Students will continue to develop citizenship
